supporting.text: Donald Trump was born in Queens, New York, which is part of the United States.

attacks.text: Donald Trump was born in Queens, New York, which is part of the United States.
Birth certificates can be forged or misrepresented, casting doubt on the authenticity of his birthplace claim.
Being born in the U.S. does not necessarily confirm American identity if dual citizenship or other allegiances are involved.
Official records and multiple independent verifications confirm the authenticity of Donald Trump's birth certificate.
U.S. law recognizes birthright citizenship, making Trump an American by birth regardless of other factors.
No credible evidence has ever been presented to support claims of a forged birth certificate.

supporting.text: Donald Trump holds U.S. citizenship and has served as the 45th President of the United States.

attacks.text: Donald Trump holds U.S. citizenship and has served as the 45th President of the United States.
Holding U.S. citizenship does not necessarily confirm someone's nationality as American, as citizenship can be acquired through naturalization.
There have been instances of individuals serving in high political offices despite controversies or doubts about their eligibility.
Naturalized citizens are legally recognized as Americans, and their citizenship is equivalent to that of native-born citizens.
The U.S. Constitution explicitly requires the President to be a natural-born citizen, which Donald Trump is.

supporting.text: There is no credible evidence or legal dispute challenging Donald Trump's American nationality.

attacks.text: There is no credible evidence or legal dispute challenging Donald Trump's American nationality.
Some individuals have questioned Trump's birth certificate, suggesting potential irregularities.
Legal disputes over nationality can be complex and may not always be publicly documented.
The authenticity of Trump's birth certificate has been verified by multiple independent sources.
The absence of public legal disputes does not necessarily mean there are no private challenges.
Private challenges to nationality would still leave some trace in legal or investigative records.
